definitions.definition: As a matter of supposition ; in the beliefs or according to the claims of some people.
examples: People from other planets have supposedly visited Earth in flying saucers.
According to your testimony, you were supposedly at home watching TV when the murder occurred.

definitions.definition: Used in place of " supposed to be ," often in informal or colloquial speech, as a mispronunciation .
examples: My parents told me I am supposedly in bed by 10 P.M.

main_definition: As a matter of supposition ; in the beliefs or according to the claims of some people.
secondary_definitions: ( Philippines , informal ) Used in place of " supposed to be ," often in informal or colloquial speech, as a mispronunciation .
